channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Prosecutors directed to seek death penalty against UnitedHealthcare killing suspect Luigi Mangione
item.description: Mangione, 26, faces separate federal and state murder charges for the killing. The federal charges include a charge of murder through use of a firearm, which carries the possibility of the death penalty.

item.title: On the heels of a dry winter, firefighters around the US brace for wildfire risks
